item.description:
The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Bottega Lounge in New Haven on Wednesday, June 25, 2008. The event is from 5:30 till 8:00. Bottega Lounge will be providing drink specials and free appetizers. Additionally, Club Getaway a camp for young professionals in upstate Connecticut is going to be giving away a free weekend vacation to Club Getaway valued at over $400 dollars and will also be providing $25 dollars off to anyone who books a weekend at Club Getaway and mentions our event. This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Drink Specials and Free Food: Bottega Lounge will be providing half price (two for one) draft beer, wine and martinis. Complimentary food includes cheese and crackers, veggies & dip, and hot assorted hors d?oeuvers (pigs in blanket, potato puffs, spring rolls, etc?)

Your contact for the event is NHC'er and Events Chair of the New Haven Young Lawyers, Josh Hecht. If you have any questions, he can be reached at (203) 772-0070
item.name: Weds. 6/25 - Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Bottega Lounge
